name: Alumni Sans Inline One
description: Alumni Inline One is a stand alone font from its base font, Alumni Sans (a variable font). Inline One is a black weight designed to be used as a display font above 32pt in print (assuming 300 dpi) and above 72px in digital media. In situations that require large text, use it in combination with the Alumni Sans base design. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/alumni-sans-inline .
author: Robert Leuschke
